# Sphinx documentation build requirements
sphinx>=7.0.0
sphinx-rtd-theme>=1.3.0
sphinx-copybutton>=0.5.0
sphinx-design>=0.5.0

# API documentation extensions
sphinx.ext.autodoc
sphinx.ext.autosummary
sphinx.ext.viewcode
sphinx.ext.napoleon
sphinx.ext.intersphinx
sphinx.ext.todo
sphinx.ext.coverage
sphinx.ext.githubpages

# Link checker dependencies
aiohttp>=3.9.0

# Mock dependencies for building docs without full environment
# These are mocked in conf.py but listed here for reference
# faiss
# numpy
# torch
# transformers
# sentence-transformers
